name: MAX Control
tagline: PHP LDAP web interface for Zentyal in Madrid TIC servers
body: ### MAX control project This project is a frontend of Zentyal (now 3.* versions) to manage users, groups, classrooms, and computers in SAMBA4/LDAP ### Install max-control * Install Zentyal 3 * Add this repo: ``` deb http://max.educa.madrid.org/max-server/max-server-2013 max main ``` * Run this commands: ``` apt-get update apt-get upgrade apt-get install max-control ``` * Open browser http://127.0.0.1/control and follow instructions ### Authors and Contributors @mariodebian
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
